original: Öberg, Gunnar, överingenjör, Hälle-kis, f. 26/5/81 i Sthlm av försäkr:tj:-m. John Ö. o. Lina Sahlsten. G. 14 m. Elsa Helleberg. Barn: Kurt f. 17, Marianne 21. — Stud:ex. v. norra real i Sthlm 00, avg:ex. fr. KTH 04. Stud:-res. t. Tyskl. 05, 09; 28. 1 :e ing. o. driftsled. v. Maltesholms Cement A-B 05-09, driftsled. o. disp :assist, v. Hellekis A-B 09>-13, v. Skånska Cement A-B Hellekisavd. 19-30, övering. där 30-46, pens. Led. av vägstyr. Medl. av Sv. tekn:fören. fr. 01. RVO, FatrGM.
translated: Öberg, Gunnar, chief engineer, Hällekis, b. 26/5/81 in Stockholm, son of insurance agent John Ö. and Lina Sahlsten. Married for 14 years to Elsa Helleberg. Children: Kurt b. 17, Marianne b. 21. — Graduated from the North Real Gymnasium in Stockholm in 1900, obtained a degree from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1904. Studied abroad in Germany in 1905, 1909, and 1928. First engineer and operations manager at Maltesholm Cement AB from 1905 to 1909, operations manager and assistant dispatcher at Hellekis AB from 1909 onwards, at Skånska Cement AB Hellekis division from 1919 to 1930, then chief engineer there from 1930 to 1946, retired. Member of the Road Board. Member of the Swedish Technical Association since 1901. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa. Father Grand Master.

structured.name: Gunnar Öberg
educationalCredentialAwarded: Stud:ex. v. norra real i Sthlm 00
